column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: expertise area. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix ex: <http://www.example.org/#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .ex:ExpertiseArea a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Expertise Area" ;    rdfs:comment "A class that represents the field of expertise of a person or an entity" .ex:hasExpertiseArea a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has expertise area" ;    rdfs:comment "A property that links a person or entity to their expertise area" ;    rdfs:domain ex:Entity ;    rdfs:range ex:ExpertiseArea .ex:Entity a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Entity" ;    rdfs:comment "A class that represents a person or an organisation" .ex:JohnDoe ex:hasExpertiseArea ex:ComputerScience .ex:ComputerScience a ex:ExpertiseArea ;    rdfs:label "Computer Science" .ex:AppleInc ex:hasExpertiseArea ex:ConsumerElectronics .ex:ConsumerElectronics a ex:ExpertiseArea ;    rdfs:label "Consumer Electronics" .```
